bug_report_1.Summary: Widget "trading calculator" disappears from the main page
bug_report_1.Precondition: Open the main page capital.com, scroll to the tradinh calculator
bug_report_1.Steps_to_reproduce: Click dropdown and slider-handls on the widget for a while (average time is 93.3 sec)
bug_report_1.AR: After some time of using the trading calculator, it disappears from the main page
bug_report_1.Comment: The bug reproduced in Yandex Browser (version - 23.1.1.1132) and Mozila Firefox (version - 109.0.1)
